comment.body: overwatch has a lot of cheater but they are ban quick the situation is kinda like warzone, the main difference is ow has no anti cheat client side it s all server side. At the begining poeple was ban on  linux but one guy go in touch with blizard and the drop the ban and accept linux users normally. The way it works is because every match has his own replay system where u will find without any difficulty who cheat and whoo dont (in a fps it s visble at the eye)
also the stupid moderation, and the rules a re applied by the head of the customer. Reddit it s just a cool concept lost in the hand of megacorp
